text: Clyde Evans (June 26, 1938 â€“ August 11, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the Ohio House of Representatives from 2003 to 2010. He ran for the Ohio Senate, but lost the primary election. Evans was a member of the Republican Party. He was born in Rio Grande, Ohio. Evans died on August 11, 2021, in Gallipolis, Ohio at age 83. ==References== ==Other websites== *Clyde Evans for State Senate official campaign website Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Ohio Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Clyde Evans
